title: (x) Squarish sans copy on Tind packaging - Foundry Gridnik {Yves}
content:
Anyone know this?

I guess the wordmark is custom, but whats the copy?

Thanks.

comments.content:
That it is!

Thanks :)

Would any of you know what the Tind is based on? Perhaps Gridnik as well?
It’s not based on anything it seems. See how the four characters interact and form a defined shape.
